content: Assumption : The Bitcoin Football Club qualified for the Champions League next season, and you're signed the Manager,  Who would you include in your 22 man squad ?The image above shows how my first team would be like... My Team B would be;  Ronaldo, Lewandoski, Messi, Thiago, Modric, Ndidi, Cucurella,  Van Dijk, Umapecano, Arnold https://startingeleven.co.uk/:  Link can be used to create your own team A.Some reasons to my first team selection.Goal Keeper; Mendy, I'll be a bit bias here coz he's African.Defends: J Cancelo and R James are both pacy fullbacks, a little bit agressive and good handler's off and on the ball, as they are both great attacker's and good defender's, modern football deserves this to inject your attacking plans offensively.Alaba and Rudiger will form a great partnership, one a bit agressive and one a bit cool.Midfield:  I think my middle Is perfect,A dribbler,creative player, And a skillful DM. Pedri reminds me of Xavi Hernandez, he drops deep to receive passes. As you'd always find De Bruyne in Space, that's one thing great players do.Attack: should be very creative, and not selfish I think I like them young and very talented. Haaland should score 40+ goals from my squad lol.Share your thoughts, and let's keep this fun please.  Correct me if I'm wrong!

They are also skillful and have uncommon strength that makes them tireless.Defenders: My defenders are chosen because of their capacity to outsmart any attacker. Defender like Robertson is pacy and tireless. They are bold and fearless.Goalkeeper: Oblak is experienced and energetic. He is confident and fearless in the goal. Coach: Jurgen Klopp

Other than that, I find your thread to be really pointless.

comments.author: Harkorede
comments.body: I think I chose my team some based on natural preference/likeness and some other on actual abilities, while a bit more on potentials or compatibility.My forward line: It consist of pace, natural instinct, dribble and top notch finishers, I don't think there's anyone I'd rather have here ahead of another.My Midfield: This might be my weakest link because It consist of two natural CM, AM, Rather than a CDM or DM, but both players are versatile and their work ethics is superb, you get a DM and CM for the price of one in N'golo Kante, while you also get a CM and AM for the price of one in De Bruyne as well, both players a dynamic and I strongly believe they'll make superb duo in the center of the field.Defense: My defensive line is composed of probably the full backs in their positions, while the centre backs are also among the elites in world football, the only problem here would be that both centre backs are right-footed, but Van Dijk often plays on the left side in the centre and I believe is super-comfortable there.Goalkeeper: This choice is perhaps borne out of natural likeness, but still I don't think his performance or capabilities are below that of what is to be considered a highly rated goalkeeper.
